thread.title: Character Serves As His Main Reason Of Coaching Success - Qarabag Head Coach's Brother | MENAFN.COM
thread.title_full: Character Serves As His Main Reason Of Coaching Success - Qarabag Head Coach's Brother | MENAFN.COM

author: MENAFN
title: Character Serves As His Main Reason Of Coaching Success - Qarabag Head Coach's Brother | MENAFN.COM
text: Forgot Username or Password Date The 59-year-old specialist said that his brother's success as a coach is due to his hard work. "I've always wanted Gurban to grow in his views rather than as a player. He worked hard enough to be a football player. Gurban and I both started playing football later in life. The victim's success is based on his hard work and suffering. On all of the teams we played, the players trained for 2–3 hours, whereas Gurban worked three times as long. Because neither I nor Gurban are gifted like certain football players. However, our hard work and business savvy have propelled us to this position. Even when playing in Russia, Gurban kept notebooks full of exercises from professionals he admired. I also utilized the notebook when I was working," he said.
